title: 1999년 State of Tennessee v. Johnny Leach 사건
summary: 미국 Tennessee, TN 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: State of Tennessee v. Johnny Leach. 판결일: 1999-10-05. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee.

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: State of Tennessee v. Johnny Leach
**판결일**: 1999-10-05
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee
**관할**: Tennessee, TN

**판사**: Judge John Everett Williams


## 판결문 요약

          IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS OF TENNESSEE
                                                                FILED
                               AT KNOXVILLE
                                                               October 5, 1999

                           AUGUST 1999 SESSION                Cecil Crowson, Jr.

VS.                             *    Honorable Lee Asbury, Judge

             Appellant.         *
